Uses of Package
ks.framework.common

Packages that use ks.framework.common
bb.client Sample bulletin-board client that connects to remote server and shows all chat messages that occur. 
bb.server Sample bulletin-board server which generated chat messages to all connected clients. 
ks.framework.cipc Component to manage access to remote client socket. 
ks.framework.common Contains Message class which is central to understanding the communication that exists between the client and server. 
ks.framework.communicator Component to manage communication from server to all of its connected clients. 
ks.framework.interfaces Defined interfaces to support the KS architecture. 
ks.framework.sipc Component to manage socket to which clients connect. 
 

Classes in ks.framework.common used by bb.client
Message
          Wrapper class for an XML Document that conforms to the ks.xsd schema defined at http://www.wpi.edu/~heineman/xml.
 

Classes in ks.framework.common used by bb.server
Message
          Wrapper class for an XML Document that conforms to the ks.xsd schema defined at http://www.wpi.edu/~heineman/xml.
 

Classes in ks.framework.common used by ks.framework.cipc
Message
          Wrapper class for an XML Document that conforms to the ks.xsd schema defined at http://www.wpi.edu/~heineman/xml.
 

Classes in ks.framework.common used by ks.framework.common
Message.MessageType
          Helper enumerated type to keep track of the types of messages.

          Wrapper class for an XML Document that conforms to the ks.xsd schema defined at http://www.wpi.edu/~heineman/xml.
